reviews.review_msg: Like many English profs he is a tough grader,  but he seems like he's on your side and wants you to improve. He's funny and relatable in class but you can tell he's smart and knows his stuff. Teaches you to write from a kind of formula, and you need to follow that formula in order to do well.

When he actually gives lectures he's interesting to listen to, but the majority of the time we just discuss pre-written questions with classmates and he doesn't teach anything. He's kind of a tough grader, and some of his criteria seems a bit arbitrary, which can be frustrating. Out of class he acts like he wants to help but doesn't really do much

Marc was a great prof; really tough marker, but he genuinely wanted to make sure he saw us improve, which was really encouraging. Still pending my final grade, but well worth taking the class, because I definitely became a better writer.
